property.value: {T}: Put two ingenuity counters on Jhoira, Ageless Innovator, then you may put an artifact card with mana value X or less from your hand onto the battlefield, where X is the number of ingenuity counters on Jhoira.

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: Legendary creatures you control get +X/+X, where X is the number of legendary creatures you control. Whenever you cast a legendary spell from your hand, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a legendary nonland card with lesser mana value. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other creatures you control get +1/+1. {3}{G}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on King Darien and create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token. Sacrifice King Darien: Creature tokens you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 2/1 red Elemental creature token with trample and haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step. {T}: Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Activate only if five or more creatures died this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap an untapped nontoken artifact you control: Add {G}. Tap two untapped nontoken artifacts you control: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why fear artifice? Is it not also of this world?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Domain - Whenever Nael, Avizoa Aeronaut deals combat damage to a player, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control. Put up to one of them on top of your library and the rest on the bottom in a random order. Then if there are five basic land types among lands you control, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash. Whenever Najal, the Storm Runner attacks, you may pay {2}. If you do, when you next cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach If a creature an opponent controls would die, exile it instead. When you do, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. {G}, Sacrifice a Saproling: Nemata, Primeval Warden gets +2/+2 until end of turn. {1}{B}, Sacrifice two Saprolings: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Queen Allenal of Ruadach's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control. If one or more creature tokens would be created under your control, those tokens plus a 1/1 white Soldier creature token are created instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - Whenever Radha, Coalition Warlord becomes tapped, another target creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Enough warm-up. I'm coming for you, Sheoldred!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control. If you do, draw a card. {3}{W}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This old ship has seen a lot, but she's not done yet."

property.name: Rules
Rules
Rules
property.value: Menace {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Dragon creature spells. Once during each of your turns, you may cast a Dragon creature spell from your graveyard. Whenever you cast a Dragon creature spell from your graveyard, it gains "When this creature dies, exile it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, each opponent loses 1 life. You may cast Rona, Sheoldred's Faithful from your graveyard by discarding two cards in addition to paying its other costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Consider yourself lucky. Not everyone is granted the gift of compleation."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Whenever Rulik Mons, Warren Chief attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped. If you didn't put a card onto the battlefield this way, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {X}. If you do, draw X cards. X can't be greater than the amount of life you gained this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shanna had heard Sisay's legend all her life. Now it was time to forge her own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, choose one that hasn't been chosen - • Draw a card. • Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. • Sol'kanar the Tainted deals 3 damage to up to one other target creature or planeswalker. • Exile Sol'kanar, then return it to the battlefield under an opponent's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Soul of Windgrace enters the battlefield or attacks, you may put a land card from a graveyard onto the battlefield tapped under your control. {G}, Discard a land card: You gain 3 life. {1}{R}, Discard a land card: Draw a card. {2}{B}, Discard a land card: Soul of Windgrace gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Stenn, Paranoid Partisan enters the battlefield, choose a card type other than creature or land. Spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast. {1}{W}{U}: Exile Stenn. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Land creatures you control have flying. Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if you control seven or more lands, up to one target land you control becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance, trample Whenever Tori D'Avenant, Fury Rider attacks, all other attacking creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Other red attacking creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. Untap each other white attacking creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sky is my birthright. I dare you to try and take it from me."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Uurg, Spawn of Turg's power is equal to the number of land cards in your graveyard. At the beginning of your upkeep, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.) {B}{G}, Sacrifice a land: You gain 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded an instant or sorcery card this way, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {2}, Sacrifice Vohar, Vodalian Desecrator: You may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard this turn. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - Whenever Zar Ojanen, Scion of Efrava becomes tapped, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with toughness less than the number of basic land types among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I carry my home in my heart."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Enchantment creatures you control have deathtouch, lifelink, and hexproof. {1}{W}: Target non-Aura enchantment you control becomes a creature in addition to its other types and has base power and base toughness each equal to its mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Automatic Librarian enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enforcing absolute quiet with extreme prejudice since 3285 AR.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Golden Argosy attacks, exile each creature that crewed it this turn. Return them to the battlefield tapped under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: "A blade is just a tool. Its power comes from the hand that wields it." - Danitha

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Inscribed Tablet: Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put a land card from among them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. If you didn't put a card into your hand this way, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - {5}, {T}: Draw a card. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you remember nothing else of our world's history, remember this: Phyrexians can be defeated." - Jodah

property.name: Rules
property.value: Karn's Sylex enters the battlefield tapped. Players can't pay life to cast spells or to activate abilities that aren't mana abilities. {X}, {T}, Exile Karn's Sylex: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value X or less. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Meteorite enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Material at dig site 165-beta confirmed to be of Null Moon origin. Immediate excavation assistance requested." - Tolarian field dispatch

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Tap an untapped legendary creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If the worst parts of history can repeat themselves, it stands to reason that the best parts can as well." - Teferi

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: Add one mana of any color. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When weapons of war are repurposed for peaceful ends, you know society has advanced." - Jodah

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender When Shield-Wall Sentinel enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with defender, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Timeless Lotus enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza exploited nature to power his war machines; in time, nature exploited his war machines to renew itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +2/+0. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When a Keldon takes a trophy from an enemy, it's usually something they can use to kill more enemies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {2}: Until end of turn, target creature with defender gains haste, can attack as though it didn't have defender, and assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying As long as Weatherlight Compleated has four or more phyresis counters on it, it's a Phyrexian creature in addition to its other types. Whenever a creature you control dies, put a phyresis counter on Weatherlight Compleated. Then draw a card if it has seven or more phyresis counters on it. If it doesn't, scry 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {W} or {U}. Adarkar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Left barren by the Brothers' War, it stands as a stark reminder of Dominaria's likely fate should the Coalition fail.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. Caves of Koilos deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After years of silence, the caves once again echo with the grisly sounds of Phyrexians preparing for war.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {U} or {B}.) Contaminated Aquifer enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The caves stretch farther than anyone knows, and the terrible legacy of Yawgmoth lurks in every shadow.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Crystal Grotto enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {B} or {R}.) Geothermal Bog enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are still a few places where the natural dangers outweigh even those posed by Phyrexian sleeper agents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {B} or {G}.) Haunted Mire enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some of the nature spirits and wraiths that haunt Urborg take offense at the term "ghost town."

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {W} or {U}.) Idyllic Beachfront enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the tradition of the original Tolarian Academy, every Tolarian campus is built near a body of water.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {R} or {G}. Karplusan Forest deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Between jagged, snowcapped peaks, the dense bands of hardy evergreens provide the perfect cover for roving bands of orc and goblin raiders.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {U} or {R}.) Molten Tributary enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though dangerous, Shiv teems with both life and mana, making it a tempting destination for ambitious mages.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a legendary spell. {T}: Add one mana of any color among legendary permanents you control. {3}, {T}, Exile Plaza of Heroes: Target legendary creature gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {G} or {W}.) Radiant Grove enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Yavimaya's inhabitants are dedicated to protecting its unspoiled jungle from the scourge of artifice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {R} or {W}.) Sacred Peaks enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Everyone is welcome in the floating Serran cities, though few but the most faithful attempt the ascent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The boiling seas around Shiv provided a welcome layer of protection for the reclaimed Mana Rig.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {B} or {R}. Sulfurous Springs deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Everything is flammable in the Burning Isles, even the mana itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {W} or {B}.) Sunlit Marsh enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the poisoned land around the Stronghold blossomed with new life in the wake of the Great Mending.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {G} or {U}.) Tangled Islet enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many of Terisiare's islands are merely extensions of the root system of the Yavimaya magnigoth forests.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Thran Portal enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands. As Thran Portal enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type. Thran Portal is the chosen type in addition to its other types. Mana abilities of Thran Portal cost an additional 1 life to activate.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {R} or {G}.) Wooded Ridgeline enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The power of long-forgotten empires still pulses in the earth of Dominaria, giving rise to strange, mana-rich pockets of growth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {G} or {U}. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As magnigoth trees expanded across the sea into Almaaz and New Argive, it became clear Yavimaya's borders were never confined by its coastline.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever another creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, put two +1/+1 counters on that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Heroism is neither a strong arm nor a divine destiny. It is the choice to stand unbowed against impossible odds."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw cards equal to the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All knowledge, past and future, is etched upon reality. Every answer we seek is out there, hidden only by the limits of our minds." - Jodah

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample As Tyrannical Pitlord enters the battlefield, choose another creature you control. The chosen creature gets +3/+3 and has flying. When Tyrannical Pitlord leaves the battlefield, sacrifice the chosen creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Ragefire Hellkite attacks, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, Ragefire Hellkite gains double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Well, the good news is that sound wasn't the volcano erupting . . ." - George, Coalition scout

property.name: Rules

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Flora and fauna alike rose to Yavimaya's defense.
